Definition: In this task, you will be given four sentences of a story. Your job is to select one of the sentence choices from (A) and (B) to complete the story such that it sounds fully coherent.

 (A) He is happy now. (B) He joined a gang.
Positive Examples.explanation: As mentioned in fourth sentence, the incident turned a new leaf to Rick's life; so, he must be happy now.
